title.narrative: Community-Managed Irrigated Agriculture Sector - Additional Financing

description.narrative: The additional financing is for the current project, which is performing well. The project will expand project outputs and activities to additional areas. It has a high degree of readiness in design, implementation, and safeguards. The project's design and implementation arrangements have been reviewed during loan processing and adjustments made as necessary. The project remains technically feasible, economically viable, and financially sound. It supports the government's development objectives and is accorded top priority by the government.
